name: Night of the Loving Dead (itch)
description:
You play as Dr Zombistein resurrecting the dead to spread love throughout the neighboring villages.

However, the villagers are angry, and they oppose your necromantic love quest.

You win when enough of your zombies have reached Town Hall.

Your zombies will automatically spawn at your Lab, but you can select which road they travel to Town Hall.

You can also spawn an ULTIMATE zombie dance party by clicking on its button when it's ready.

Each captured location along the way will grant you stat increases or additional zombies.

Good Luck
